subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The No. 7 Wildcats ended the opening game of the Jimmy V Classic at the Garden on a 23-9 run against Illinois, before the No. 4 Cardinals wore down Indiana in the second half of the nightcap.
snippet: The No. 7 Wildcats ended the opening game of the Jimmy V Classic at the Garden on a 23-9 run against Illinois, before the No. 4 Cardinals wore down Indiana in the second half of the nightcap.
